orian.enter.text: I'm crushed between two worlds. I don't know yet how to resolve this, but there is no turning back... What I am seeking is buried deep within at the core, to reach it I will be playing with death. This is my ultimatum.

black.newlore2: You’re back again. I can’t say I’m surprised.
black.newlore3: All those adventures, all those fantastical lands and in the end you end up back here.
black.newlore4: Back to your land of safe promises and false dreams.
black.newlore7: You build all these defences to keep yourself out, from what really lies within you.
black.newlore12: … and even as you try to block everything out, it will always come back to you.
black.newlore13: You may draw in your hands, but they will scurry along your skin.
black.newlore14: You may close your eyes, but their eyes will still pierce through the darkness.
black.newlore15: You may shut your ears to the outside world, but you will still hear their skittering.
black.newlore16: … But I think you know that too.
black.newlore17: I hate you! I genuinely loathe you, with every fibre of my being.
black.newlore18: You knew the consequences, you knew it wasn’t safe, but still you pushed and pushed.
black.newlore19: Yet it was not you who suffered.
black.newlore21: Always having other people take the blame.
black.newlore24: You say that you would give up anything, to change the past.
black.newlore25: What do you even have left?
black.newlore27: Face it, there is nothing of value to you that you can still give.
black.newlore28: You cannot turn back the wheel of time.
black.newlore30: How your hands fight against its current.
black.newlore31: But it is a river unceasing, never to turn the other way.
black.newlore33: And there is nothing you can do to change that.
black.newlore37: Where your every thought goes to rot…
black.newlore38: It gives me no pleasure to watch you struggle and writhe, you know.
black.newlore39: To watch you descend and wallow in misery.
black.newlore40: But perhaps it is only fitting...
black.newlore42: No.. You can’t just let it go like this, not yet!
black.newlore44: I will not let you reach your sweet salvation.
black.newlore45: I await you in the church beyond…
black.newlore48: And you will return to your dreamscape of false hopes where you belong.
black.newlore52: Your will was stronger than I could have ever imagined…
black.newlore53: So you finally found the strength to forgive yourself.
black.newlore54: To let go of the past.
black.newlore56: It takes a very strong person to do that, you know.
black.newlore57: I have watched you wander through this false dreamscape time and time again.
black.newlore58: And at long last, my duty is done, and your journey is over.
black.newlore59: I hope that you have sincerely enjoyed it.
black.newlore60: Now it is time for you to take the final step.
lgray.beta.newtxt1: A land of hope and promise, the light a fickle thing. Immortal eyes, struck from the skies, the destruction he will bring.
lgray.beta.newtxt2: Storm and thunder sound, sun gone in a spark. The day cut short, entrench the fort, and leave them to the dark.
lgray.beta.newtxt3: In time the wounded gather, to hear a hopeful song. Their voices ring, summon the King, and remind him why they're strong.
lgray.beta.newtxt4: They crowd against the door, that holds them from the light. He hides his face in the tallest place, they must not know his plight.
lgray.beta.newtxt5: Wood splinter forth, another chance to act. As the foundation shakes, they pray it stays intact.
lgray.beta.newtxt6: They reach the furthest heights, the door atop ajar. Fear instilled, noble blood spilled, scarred a grim memoir.
lgray.beta.newtxt7: A gruesome scene unfurled, the night has not been kind. They look out upon the ashes, afraid of what they'll find.
lgray.beta.newtxt8: Battlefield empty, the smoke and dust has set. Prayers turn to ash as their hearts fill with regret.
lgray.beta.newtxt9: Shrouded black and heart attack, the landscape tear and rend. Sliver fades, barren glades, life brought to an end.

redtweak.charm.3: will grant all players with regeneration I for 5 minutes.

ca.charon.adv.root.title: Lexica: Death Note
ca.charon.adv.root.desc: Listed in these pages is every active death modifier in this world.
ca.charon.adv.death_drop.title: Death Drop
ca.charon.adv.death_drop.desc: -------------------------- On death, some of your items are dropped into a bundle on the ground. The bundle cannot be destroyed or despawn. (While it rests on the ground in this way). --------------------------
ca.charon.adv.void_return.title: Void Return
ca.charon.adv.void_return.desc: --------------------------- Players that fall into the void take damage and are returned to the last stable ground they stood on. The damage received is proportional to the distance fallen. Death effects occur at the last stable ground you stood on. ---------------------------
ca.charon.death.1: Death has allowed you to see beyond the veil, and you
ca.charon.death.2: return to life with scraps of notes about the world beyond.
ca.charon.death.4: Open Advancements to see Lexica tabs (and view the Death Note).
ca.charon.shade.tutorial: Revive a player by sneaking and looking directly at their shade!
ca.charon.shade.despawn.chat: Your shade was not revived, and dropped its items normally.
ca.charon.shade.purge: Another player has collected your shade's items.
ca.charon.shade.revive.1: %s has revived you via your shade!
ca.charon.shade.revive.2: You have returned to your death location.
ca.charon.shade.revive.3: Your items have been returned to you.
ca.enchants.lexica.name: §lArcane Notes
ca.enchants.adv.root.title: Lexica: Arcane Notes
ca.enchants.adv.root.desc: Whenever you find a mysterious enchantment, this tab creates a short description of it.
ca.enchants.adv.tree_passive.title: Passives
ca.enchants.adv.tree_passive.desc: Enchantments that activate while held, or on armor.
ca.enchants.adv.adrenaline.title: Adrenaline
ca.enchants.adv.adrenaline.desc: When the user slays a mob, they gain a speed boost that shrinks over time.
ca.enchants.adv.agility.title: Agility
ca.enchants.adv.agility.desc: The user's jump strength is increased.
ca.enchants.adv.aquadynamic.title: Aquadynamic
ca.enchants.adv.aquadynamic.desc: When the user enters water they receive Conduit Power and Dolphins Grace. Kills underwater refresh the duration.
ca.enchants.adv.cauterize.title: Cauterize
ca.enchants.adv.cauterize.desc: Mobs you attack that are on fire are extinguished, dealing some of the leftover fire damage immediately.
ca.enchants.adv.cleansing.title: Cleansing
ca.enchants.adv.cleansing.desc: While using, cleanses the specified debuff from the player, in exchange for temporary Hunger.
ca.enchants.adv.concealed.title: Concealed
ca.enchants.adv.concealed.desc: When the user slays a mob, they gain limited Stealth. While Stealthed, the user is harder to detect and gains a temporary damage boost.
ca.enchants.adv.confidence.title: Confidence
ca.enchants.adv.confidence.desc: While above 75% Max Health, deal additional melee damage.
ca.enchants.adv.desperation.title: Desperation
ca.enchants.adv.desperation.desc: While below 50% Max Health, deal additional melee damage.
ca.enchants.adv.disengage.title: Disengage
ca.enchants.adv.disengage.desc: When the user takes damage, sneak jumping shortly after propels them backwards.
ca.enchants.adv.energetic.title: Energetic
ca.enchants.adv.energetic.desc: When the user slays a mob, they gain an attack speed boost that shrinks over time.
ca.enchants.adv.evasion.title: Evasion
ca.enchants.adv.evasion.desc: Grants a small chance (per level) to dodge an attack, negating it entirely. When you dodge, blind nearby enemies.
ca.enchants.adv.frenzy.title: Frenzy
ca.enchants.adv.frenzy.desc: When the user slays a mob, they gain a melee damage boost that shrinks over time.
ca.enchants.adv.gravity.title: Gravity
ca.enchants.adv.gravity.desc: When the user hits a mob while falling, the fall damage they would take is negated and damage is dealt to mobs within 3 blocks.
ca.enchants.adv.lifesteal.title: Lifesteal
ca.enchants.adv.lifesteal.desc: Restores health when the user kills a mob.
ca.enchants.adv.lightborn.title: Lightborn
ca.enchants.adv.lightborn.desc: When the user slays a mob, grants a chance that a torch is placed in front of them.
ca.enchants.adv.momentum.title: Momentum
ca.enchants.adv.momentum.desc: The user sprints to charge up, gaining speed and damage. When fully charged, a melee attack releases all charge and hits all nearby mobs.
ca.enchants.adv.poise.title: Poise
ca.enchants.adv.poise.desc: While above 50% Max Health, gain additional armor.
ca.enchants.adv.quake.title: Quake
ca.enchants.adv.quake.desc: While worn or held, killing a mob emits a blast around you that damages nearby mobs.
ca.enchants.adv.rally.title: Rally
ca.enchants.adv.rally.desc: Enemies that attack the user are marked. Hitting a marked mob restores health.
ca.enchants.adv.reconstruction.title: Reconstruction
ca.enchants.adv.reconstruction.desc: This item slowly repairs over time while in the hotbar, offhand, or armor slot.
ca.enchants.adv.regeneration.title: Regeneration
ca.enchants.adv.resourceful.title: Resourceful
ca.enchants.adv.resourceful.desc: When the wearer/holder would consume an arrow, they have a chance not to.
ca.enchants.adv.satiation.title: Satiation
ca.enchants.adv.satiation.desc: When the user consumes food, gain a brief combat buff.
ca.enchants.adv.second_wind.title: Second Wind
ca.enchants.adv.second_wind.desc: Saves you from a lethal hit, gaining brief Resistance V. After cheating death, you must kill all mobs attacking you, or die shortly after.
ca.enchants.adv.shielding.title: Shielding
ca.enchants.adv.shielding.desc: The user periodically gains an Absorption I shield that lasts until broken.
ca.enchants.adv.sprint_dash.title: Sprint Dash
ca.enchants.adv.sprint_dash.desc: When the user sprint jumps, they get a burst of motion that propels them forward.
ca.enchants.adv.spurs.title: Spurs
ca.enchants.adv.spurs.desc: The user breaks nearby flora, webs, and berry bushes.
ca.enchants.adv.stalwart.title: Stalwart
ca.enchants.adv.stalwart.desc: While below 50% Max Health, gain additional armor.
ca.enchants.adv.starfall.title: Starfall
ca.enchants.adv.starfall.desc: While worn or held, periodically damages a random mob near you. It cannot strike the same mob twice in a row.
ca.enchants.adv.thorns.title: Thorns
ca.enchants.adv.thorns.desc: When the user is attacked, they retaliate against their attacker, dealing damage. If the armor has on hit melee effect enchantments (such as Fire Aspect) those are also applied.
ca.enchants.desc.adrenaline: When the user slays a mob, they gain a speed boost that shrinks over time.
ca.enchants.desc.agility: The user's jump strength is increased.

ca.enchants.adv.tree_melee.title: Melee
ca.enchants.adv.tree_melee.desc: Enchantments that affect melee weapons. (Swords, Axes, etc.)
ca.enchants.adv.duelist.title: Duelist
ca.enchants.adv.duelist.desc: Melee attacks with this weapon do additional damage to "Illager" mobs.
ca.enchants.adv.echo.title: Echo
ca.enchants.adv.echo.desc: The weapon stores charges over time and from kills. Charges are used when attacking to recharge your cooldown. When out of charges, the weapon is slower.
ca.enchants.adv.evocation.title: Evocation
ca.enchants.adv.evocation.desc: The weapon stores charges over time and from kills. Charges are used on crit, sneak, and sprint attacks to create Evoker fangs.
ca.enchants.adv.executioner.title: Executioner
ca.enchants.adv.executioner.desc: Melee attacks from this weapon finish off enemies left at low health.
ca.enchants.adv.first_strike.title: First Strike
ca.enchants.adv.first_strike.desc: The first melee attack you make in an instance of combat deals extra damage. This buff refreshes when you leave combat.
ca.enchants.adv.frostbite.title: Frostbite
ca.enchants.adv.frostbite.desc: Melee attacks with this weapon inflict Slowness.
ca.enchants.adv.hex_eater.title: Hex Eater
ca.enchants.adv.hex_eater.desc: This weapon deals additional damage to debuffed enemies and cleanses their debuffs.
ca.enchants.adv.hunter.title: Hunter
ca.enchants.adv.hunter.desc: Melee attacks with this weapon do additional damage to "monstrous" mobs (such as Creepers, Blazes, normal Piglins, and Endermen).
ca.enchants.adv.lethality.title: Lethality
ca.enchants.adv.lethality.desc: Melee attacks with this weapon deal additional damage on critical hits.
ca.enchants.adv.singe.title: Singe
ca.enchants.adv.singe.desc: Melee attacks with this weapon do additional damage to mobs that are on fire (or fiery mobs).
ca.enchants.adv.slamming.title: Slamming
ca.enchants.adv.slamming.desc: The weapon stores charges over time and from kills. Charges are used when crit-attacking to deal damage to other nearby mobs. Those mobs take a portion of the weapon's damage.
ca.enchants.adv.sweeping.title: Sweeping
ca.enchants.adv.sweeping.desc: The weapon stores charges over time and from kills. Charges are used when attacking to create empowered sweep attacks.
ca.enchants.adv.thrusting.title: Thrusting
ca.enchants.adv.thrusting.desc: The weapon stores charges over time and from kills. Charges are used when attacking and sprint attacking to pierce damage to mobs behind your target. Those mobs take a portion of the weapon's damage.
ca.enchants.desc.duelist: This weapon deals 2.5 bonus damage per level to "illager" mobs: [Vindicator, Pillager, Evoker, Ravager, Vex, Witch].
ca.enchants.desc.echo: The weapon stores charges over time and from kills. Charges are used when attacking to recharge your cooldown. When out of charges, the weapon is slower.

ca.enchants.adv.tree_ranged.title: Ranged
ca.enchants.adv.tree_ranged.desc: Enchantments that affect bows, tridents, and crossbows.
ca.enchants.adv.auto_charge.title: Auto Charge
ca.enchants.adv.auto_charge.desc: When you kill a mob, the crossbow automatically reloads a free shot. (It must be on your hotbar)
ca.enchants.adv.collapse.title: Collapse
ca.enchants.adv.collapse.desc: Ranged throws that hit spawners spawn an entity that breaks the spawner over time.
ca.enchants.adv.current.title: Current
ca.enchants.adv.current.desc: On ranged attacks, the trident drags the victim to its position (back to the thrower when combined with Loyalty).
ca.enchants.adv.deadeye.title: Deadeye
ca.enchants.adv.deadeye.desc: Instead of arrows, this crossbow fires fast traveling bullets.
ca.enchants.adv.explosive.title: Explosive
ca.enchants.adv.explosive.desc: Arrows fired from this weapon explode when they hit enemies. Effects the arrows would gain from enchants are spread to hit enemies.
ca.enchants.adv.fleetfoot.title: Fleetfoot
ca.enchants.adv.fleetfoot.desc: While being reloaded or drawn back, the user moves at normal walk speed.
ca.enchants.adv.frost.title: Frost
ca.enchants.adv.frost.desc: Arrows fired from this weapon inflict Slowness on enemies.
ca.enchants.adv.hydraulic.title: Hydraulic
ca.enchants.adv.hydraulic.desc: The trident's throw attack is replaced by a close ranged watery shove that knocks all nearby enemies back and deals damage.
ca.enchants.adv.overcharge.title: Overcharge
ca.enchants.adv.overcharge.desc: This bow can be drawn for a longer time, for increased damage.
ca.enchants.adv.point_blank.title: Point Blank
ca.enchants.adv.point_blank.desc: Arrows from this weapon deal increased damage to enemies closer to you.
ca.enchants.adv.recoil.title: Recoil
ca.enchants.adv.recoil.desc: Shooting this crossbow (while not sneaking) knocks you back based on the direction you are looking.
ca.enchants.adv.repeating.title: Repeating
ca.enchants.adv.repeating.desc: When reloaded, loads in additional arrows that can be fired in rapid succession.
ca.enchants.adv.repulsion.title: Repulsion
ca.enchants.adv.repulsion.desc: When this crossbow is reloaded, a blast of wind is created, knocking back nearby enemies.
ca.enchants.adv.ricochet.title: Ricochet
ca.enchants.adv.ricochet.desc: Throws from this trident bounce to additional nearby enemies.
ca.enchants.adv.sharpshot.title: Sharpshot
ca.enchants.adv.sharpshot.desc: Arrows from this weapon deal more damage the farther they travel.
ca.enchants.adv.tempest.title: Tempest
ca.enchants.adv.tempo_theft.title: Tempo Theft
ca.enchants.adv.tempo_theft.desc: Arrows fired from this weapon temporarily steal movement speed from enemies.
ca.enchants.adv.trueshot.title: Trueshot
ca.enchants.adv.trueshot.desc: Arrows fired from this weapon are unaffected by gravity and move twice as fast.
ca.enchants.adv.wavedash.title: Wavedash
ca.enchants.adv.wavedash.desc: Trident ranged attacks with this weapon teleport the user to the hit target.

ca.enchants.desc.trueshot: Arrows fired from this weapon are unaffected by gravity and move twice as fast.
ca.enchants.desc.wavedash: Trident ranged attacks with this weapon teleport the user to the hit target.
ca.enchants.adv.tree_tool.title: Tools
ca.enchants.adv.eruption.title: Eruption
ca.enchants.adv.eruption.desc: When you break a spawner with this tool, deal damage to enemies near the spawner. Inflict melee effects (like Fire Aspect) when triggered.
ca.enchants.adv.sapper.title: Sapper
ca.enchants.adv.sapper.desc: When you break a spawner with this tool, restore health.

ca.enchants.adv.tree_other.title: Other Enchantments
ca.enchants.adv.tree_other.desc: Enchantments that don't fit in any other category.
ca.enchants.adv.infinity.title: Infinity
ca.enchants.adv.infinity.desc: When on a consumable item, grants infinite usage of the item.
ca.enchants.adv.soulbound.title: Soulbound
ca.enchants.adv.soulbound.desc: This item is not dropped on death.
ca.enchants.adv.unbreakable.title: Unbreakable
ca.enchants.adv.unbreakable.desc: This equipment does not have durability.

ca.enchants.adv.curse_clumsiness.title: Curse of Clumsiness
ca.enchants.adv.curse_clumsiness.desc: When you take fall damage, you take additional fall damage.
ca.enchants.adv.curse_drowning.title: Curse of Drowning
ca.enchants.adv.curse_drowning.desc: While touching water, you will slowly take drowning damage.
ca.enchants.adv.curse_encumbering.title: Curse of Encumbering
ca.enchants.adv.curse_encumbering.desc: Arrows from this weapon travel at drastically reduced speed. (Their damage is unaffected)
ca.enchants.adv.curse_flammability.title: Curse of Flammability
ca.enchants.adv.curse_flammability.desc: When you take Fire damage, take additional fire damage.
ca.enchants.adv.curse_irreparability.des: This item cannot be repaired by an anvil.
ca.enchants.adv.curse_jinxing.title: Curse of Jinxing
ca.enchants.adv.curse_jinxing.desc: When you take Wither or Poison damage, take additional magic damage.
ca.enchants.adv.curse_malevolence.title: Curse of Malevolence
ca.enchants.adv.curse_malevolence.desc: When more than 1 of these items is used at a time, the user is inflicted with Blindness.
ca.enchants.adv.curse_regret.title: Curse of Regret
ca.enchants.adv.curse_regret.desc: The user is damaged when they use this item. The higher the level, the more damage is dealt.
ca.enchants.adv.curse_rusting.title: Curse of Rusting
ca.enchants.adv.curse_rusting.desc: The item slowly takes durability damage over time (to a cap).
ca.enchants.adv.curse_shattering.title: Curse of Shattering
ca.enchants.adv.curse_shattering.desc: When the user dies and drops this item, it loses a portion of remaining durability.

ca.statuses.lexica.name: §lAfflictions
ca.statuses.adv.root.title: Lexica: Afflictions
ca.statuses.adv.root.desc: Whenever you use a mysterious status effect, this tab creates a short description of it.
ca.statuses.adv.tree_positive.title: Positive Effects
ca.statuses.adv.tree_positive.desc: Beneficial Custom Status Effects that are helpful (to enemies).
ca.statuses.adv.cloaked.title: Cloaked
ca.statuses.adv.cloaked.desc: Affected mob is invisible, creating noises and particles around it to indicate its presence. When attacked, the remaining duration is reduced.
ca.statuses.desc.cloaked: Affected mob is invisible, creating noises and particles around it to indicate its presence. When attacked, the remaining duration is reduced.
ca.statuses.adv.tree_negative.title: Negative Effects
ca.statuses.adv.tree_negative.desc: Harmful Custom Status Effects that are detrimental (to enemies).
ca.statuses.adv.bleeding.title: Bleeding
ca.statuses.adv.bleeding.desc: Affected mob takes damage every second based on the number of stacks applied. When they take damage, the number of stacks is cut in half.
ca.statuses.adv.blindness.title: Blindness
ca.statuses.adv.blindness.desc: Affected mob has a greatly reduced follow and sight range.
ca.statuses.adv.brittle.title: Brittle
ca.statuses.adv.brittle.desc: When the affected mob takes enough damage, they explode and deal a burst of damage to themselves and nearby mobs.
ca.statuses.adv.charmed.title: Charmed
ca.statuses.adv.charmed.desc: Affected mob is briefly blinded, and after, attacks the nearest hostile mob to it for a limited time.
ca.statuses.adv.exposed.title: Exposed
ca.statuses.adv.exposed.desc: Affected mob takes additional damage every time they would receive damage.
ca.statuses.adv.infected.title: Infected

ca.statuses.desc.blindness: Affected mob has a greatly reduced follow and sight range.
ca.statuses.desc.brittle: When the affected mob takes enough damage, they explode and deal a burst of damage to themselves and nearby mobs.

ca.abilities.adv.duplicator.title: Duplicator

ca.abilities.adv.haunt.title: Haunt
ca.abilities.adv.haunt.desc: The enemy creates an invulnerable spectre that chases players, damaging them if close.
ca.abilities.adv.healer.title: Healer
ca.abilities.adv.healer.desc: The enemy can charge up to heal other nearby enemies.
ca.abilities.adv.hookshot.title: Hookshot
ca.abilities.adv.hookshot.desc: The enemy can fire a hook projectile that drags players back towards the enemy.
ca.abilities.adv.laser.title: Laser

ca.abilities.adv.reflect.title: Reflect
ca.abilities.adv.reflect.desc: The enemy briefly prepares, then attacks several times. While attacking, the enemy is invulnerable.

ca.abilities.adv.rift.desc: The enemy creates damaging shockwaves that travel away from it.

monu.armor.5.lore: Born from the lava, blessed with volcanic might
teleport.first.unlock: Congratulations! You have reached the white teleporter. You can set your spawn at this teleporter, and when you encounter future teleporters, you'll be able to come right back here.
black.lavagate.back: You cannot enter this area until you have unlocked the gate!
wool.black.lavagate.unlock: Screams of fury rush out of the river gate...
wool.black.cryptgate.unlock: Whispered pleads echo out of from beneath the cathedral...
wool.black.key1: A spark of light begins to illuminate the darkness...
wool.black.key3: Warm rays of light pierce the fog...
wool.black.key4: You feel a weight lifted off your shoulders. It is time to move on...
wool.black.unlock.base: You have warmed up the central cave and may now enter the icy pit below.
wool.black.fog.notification: You cannot enter the pit until it has been warmed up first!
lightblue.unlock: The light blue wool box is now unlocked!
lightblue.keynotif: The light blue wool box is locked behind three coral keys! Find the keys and place them on their respective bedrock pedestals to unlock the wool.
white.dialogue.5: And while I hoped to never see you anew,
white.dialogue.7: As long as you remember your way here,
white.dialogue.9: because it means you haven't given up.
white.dialogue.10: This time the darkness came close.
white.dialogue.15: And then set forth in the journey of eternity.
white.dialogue.16: I'll accompany you, for a little while.
white.dialogue.17: What is a dream if not liberty chained?
white.dialogue.18: We think that dreams are ruled by conscious desire.
white.dialogue.19: We wish to close our eyes and fly, marry the fairest bride
white.dialogue.20: and hold in our palm the whole sky.
white.dialogue.21: However, the oneiric flows from the subconscious,
white.dialogue.22: a realm of shadows which feeds on truth.
white.dialogue.23: And so the chains of life become the chains of dream.
white.dialogue.24: Sorry for waxing poetic about the dark side of dreams.
white.dialogue.25: I promise, they offer a lot of good too.
white.dialogue.26: At times, they are dictators with gentle hearts.
white.dialogue.28: Would a joke knock a different expression into that precious face of yours?
white.dialogue.30: Why aren't you knocked out laughing? That was the punchline.
white.dialogue.34: It is the spice that gives spark to life.
white.dialogue.35: This time the abyss came close, guided by your own hand.
white.dialogue.37: You can't imagine how bright it makes me
white.dialogue.39: I wouldn't be alive without you.
white.dialogue.40: Not sure I'm alive now, but at least I exist in some shape.
white.dialogue.42: The rope, the knife, the pill, the fall,
white.dialogue.43: they would zap it all away.
white.dialogue.44: Nothing you feel, in this vast uncaring universe,
white.dialogue.45: is small enough not to matter.
white.dialogue.49: for you are still so young.
white.dialogue.50: The steps may be heavier than ever,
white.dialogue.51: and you might have to venture deeper.
white.dialogue.53: With hope, and firm footing, you can make it.
white.dialogue.55: You already know. It's love and hatred, sorrow and laughter, logic and emotion.
white.dialogue.56: The self. Your dreams and truths. Cognition. All that makes you, you.
white.dialogue.59: We are within your own psyche, courageous one.
white.dialogue.61: I am the best of you.
white.dialogue.62: Every being in here shares the same pair of eyes.
wool.black.church.unlock: The door below creaks open. The final threshold awaits. It is time to face what you have hidden away...
white.warning.1: Careful! Immortal Cognition cannot be defeated the common way.
white.warning.2: Try knocking them into the void!
white.warning.3: Sorry about the mess, the Symphony is usually much calmer.

black.tylore1.lore1: I hear the dripping of water.
black.tylore1.lore2: Like a tap, it keeps dripping and dripping.
black.tylore2.lore1: I've given it water. I've given it soil. It won't grow.
black.tylore2.lore2: It keeps rotting, I can't let it rot!
black.tylore2.lore4: I'd give it my wealth, my pride, my everything.
black.tylore3.lore1: I've done it! I've given it everything!
black.tylore3.lore3: Even my Heart... I hear its whispers.
black.tylore3.lore4: It tells me it will bring
black.lore1.line1: The flesh still pulsates and oozes,
black.lore1.line3: something distant and pure... But what?
black.lore2.line1: Close your eyes. There is nothing
black.lore2.line2: under the church. There is nothing
black.lore2.line3: under the church. There is nothing
black.lore3.line1: There were good times, I think once,
black.lore3.line2: great times even. Those times seem
black.lore3.line3: so far away now... And now all that is
black.lore4.line1: I knew the illusion would fade. I knew
black.lore4.line2: it couldn't last. But why does it have to
black.lore4.line3: hurt so much? The thorns were strangling me.
black.lore4.line4: But it was within those thorns that comfort
black.lore4.line5: came the most easily... No. I can deny
white.weapon.1.lore: In life there's birth, death and the spice in between

orian.key.stage.a: The key must be here, but in a different world.
orian.key.b:
2/2 Keys obtained 
The central lock is now openable.
orian.lock.inner.init.a: Keys are missing. Maybe I can find some around the towers.
orian.lock.inner.mid.a: Missing the last key. I can find it around the towers.
orian.lock.inner.open.a: Before delving deeper, I should be able to obtain boons by taking gateways to this realm. I might need it.
orian.help.a: The objective seems to be down here, but it's inaccessible.
orian.help.init.a: What I need to progress should be in those towers.
orian.help.key.a: To change worlds, I cannot avoid being hurt. Death might not be the only way; there are doors I can traverse.
orian.help.end: I found what to do by changing perspective. I'm on my way through another world. Gateways help me.
orian.warp.inner.a: In the beginning were the blocks and the blocks made the world.
orian.warp.inner.d: Where the blocks end the world ends.
orian.warp.inner.e: You cannot go forward in the absence of space.
orian.warp.stage: This path leads to an uncertain future. I don't know where I will end up by taking it.
orian.key.burn: I will bear through the scalding fire with Unending Resilience.
orian.key.pain: I will handle the intense pain with Unbreakable Resolve.
orian.key.stage: What I need is right there, yet I can't grasp it. I tried everything I could think of to no avail, I need to change perspective but I fear it will too painful...
orian.lock.inner.init: I lack the determination to do this.
orian.lock.inner.mid: I need something more to give me the last push.
orian.lock.inner.open: Now there is nothing left but to confront it. Here goes!
orian.lock.burn.open: By my Unending Resilience, I have gone through fire and war.
orian.lock.stage.open: By my Unbreakable Resolve, I have survived through this ordeal. Now there is nowhere I cannot go and nothing I cannot accomplish.
orian.flawless: Impressive! You did not falter even once. Maybe there is yet hope for you...
orian.help: I'm lost, I feel like I can't escape. There are things that need to be confronted, but I lack the strength to do so... My goal is just out of reach.
orian.help.init: I can feel myself decaying, I need to find a solution to avoid trudging in the muck. Maybe there is inspiration to be found by secluding myself.
orian.help.key: Facing a dead end, there is no choice but to bore a way out. Involving only myself, no matter the cost, even through the harm... I cannot give up.

lime.lore.screen.river.c: Let us build you a place of eternal peace.

lime.lore.screen.forest.b: The environment must adapt to your psyche,

lime.lore.screen.secret.b: Are you making the right decisions? Are you sure you're being yourself?
lime.lore.screen.secret.c: Are these questions important? It's okay not to know,
lime.lore.screen.secret.d: you'll find the answers along the way, that's for sure.
orange.item.memebook.name: Passions Call
orange.item.memebook.1:
Passions Call

A heartwrenching tale of romance

by Assu Wumannu
orange.item.memebook.2: *This book is appallingly bad. It follows the life of an apparently halfwit (but incredibly beautiful) woman who makes decisions so amazingly foolish you cannot sympathize with her in the slightest.
orange.item.memebook.3: Near the beginning of the book she meets a handsome, noble knight, whom she cannot help but admire, but for certain of his actions, for reasons you don't really understand, cause her to hate him with incredibly intense fury.
orange.item.memebook.4: Most of the book describes predictable "embarrassing" scenes where the two meet and make complete idots of themselves while gradually developing a thread of romance. The book feels like the cumulation of all the poorly romantic tropes in the book,
orange.item.memebook.5: taking the worst qualities of them all and meshing them into a masterfully horrible plot. Adding to the effct, the author's writing style uses similes and metaphors so absurd they change the romantic scenes into utter hilarity.
orange.item.memebook.6: What is even worse of sin is the lack of consistency. The halfwit woman contradicts herself with what she thinks, says, and does constantly.
orange.item.memebook.7: Furthermore, the chronology of scenes is completely illogical. The time skips in combination with the passing events are not realistic in the slightest.This book is the greatest amalgamation of all possible literary blunders that can be made in a single novel.
orange.item.memebook.8: Reading this book is the greatest thing to waste time. There is no way to examine the text and uncover any true and beautiful meaning hidden within. The best books are not only about a good romance, but about the saturation of symbolism and meaning within.
